item.title: 美国科技股现金牛将挑战轮动交易
item.description:
随着第四季度财报季拉开帷幕，小盘股和价值股的表现正超越科技股。

【原文：

Small caps and value stocks are outperforming tech as fourth-quarter results kick off.

】

item.title: 泰国央行寻求更多权力以遏制非法资金流动
item.description: 泰国央行行长维泰·拉塔纳空表示，泰国央行正寻求更广泛的权力以应对金融体系中的结构性风险，包括可能扭曲泰铢汇率的非法资金流动和投机活动。【原文：Thailand’s central bank is seeking broader powers to tackle structural risks in the financial system, including illicit-money flows and speculative activity that can distort the baht, Governor Vitai Ratanakorn said.】

item.title: 对冲基金化危为机，创16年来最佳收益
item.description: 对冲基金投资者自全球金融危机后从未如此顺风顺水。【原文：Hedge fund investors haven’t had it this good since the aftermath of the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 财报季将检验华尔街轮动策略
item.description: 随着最新财报季拉开帷幕，投资者对那些最能受益于经济加速增长的企业的新近青睐将面临严峻考验。【原文：Investors’ newfound affinity for companies that benefit most from an accelerating economy is in for a tough test as the latest earnings season kicks off.】

item.title: 全球央行行长们对美联储主席鲍威尔表示"完全支持"
item.description: 在特朗普政府对美联储施加了史无前例的压力之后，全球央行行长们纷纷表态支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔。【原文：Global central bankers threw their support behind Chairman Jerome Powell after the Trump administration ratcheted up its already unprecedented pressure campaign against the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 库茨考虑为高净值客户提供阿瑞斯和阿波罗基金
item.description: 库茨公司正考虑让其富裕客户接触由全球最大另类资产管理公司运营的基金，以期从私人资产需求中获利。【原文：Coutts & Co. is weighing plans to give its wealthy clients access to funds run by some of the world’s largest alternative asset managers as it seeks to cash in on demand for private assets.】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司预计房利美和房地美购债将推动抵押贷款利率回落
item.description: 美国通过购买抵押贷款证券来降低住房成本的举措，正提振全球最大债券管理公司之一太平洋投资管理公司的乐观预期。【原文：US efforts to bring down the cost of housing through buying mortgage securities are bolstering a bullish outlook at Pacific Investment Management Co, one of the world’s largest bond managers.】

item.title: 阿联酋和中国领衔特朗普伊朗关税风险国名单
item.description: 中国和阿拉伯联合酋长国是伊朗最大的贸易伙伴，因此它们在可能受到特朗普总统25%关税威胁的国家名单中位居前列。【原文：China and the United Arab Emirates are Iran’s largest trading partners, putting them at the top of the list of countries at risk of being hit by President Donald Trump’s 25% tariff threat.】

item.title: Spotify新任CEO们正面临算法疲劳与愤怒艺术家的双重挑战
item.description:
他们希望人工智能能帮助解决其中一些问题。

【原文：

And they’re hoping AI can help solve some of those problems.

】

item.title: Musk’s X Faces Legal Action by Malaysia Over Grok Sexual Images
item.description: Malaysia said it will take legal action against Elon Musk’s X for failing to protect users in the Southeast Asian nation, just days after it banned the artificial intelligence tool Grok over its generation of sexual content.

item.title: JPMorgan Weighs Top Rival Bankers to Lead India Expansion Drive
item.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. has approached multiple high profile candidates to be the new top executive to run its expanding operations in India, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Orsted Jumps After Ruling to Resume Wind Project Halted by Trump
item.description: Orsted A/S shares surged after a US judge ruled work can resume on a wind farm off the coast of Rhode Island while it challenges the government’s latest attempt to stop offshore projects from being built.

item.title: Central Banks Work on Statement in Solidarity With Fed’s Powell
item.description: Global central bank officials are working on a statement to show solidarity with Chairman Jerome Powell after the Trump administration dramatically escalated its pressure campaign toward the Federal Reserve, according to a person familiar with the matter.

item.title: GA-Backed Acko Said to Seek Banks for $350 Million India IPO
item.description: Indian digital insurer Acko Technology & Services Pvt. has invited pitches from investment banks for a potential initial public offering to raise as much as $350 million, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: 欧洲股市涨势现已创下十余年来最强劲表现
item.description: 欧洲股市正闪现警示信号，表明这场由盈利和经济乐观情绪推动的反弹行情已近尾声。【原文：Warning signs are flashing in European stocks that a rally fueled by optimism about earnings and the economy is running out of road.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧据称正考虑出售中国资产等多种方案
item.description: 知情人士透露，帝亚吉欧公司正考虑对其中国资产进行重组，包括潜在的资产剥离。这家生产健力士和尊尼获加的酒业巨头正寻求精简其产品组合。【原文：Diageo Plc is considering options for its Chinese assets, including potential divestments, people familiar with the matter said, as the maker of Guinness and Johnnie Walker seeks to streamline its portfolio.】

item.title: 英国企业经营状况好转，Premier Inn酒店业主认为其税负影响将降低
item.description: 惠特布雷德集团旗下Premier Inn酒店预计，英国预算案对其业务的影响将低于此前担忧，因其英国业务表现已显现复苏迹象。【原文：Premier Inn-owner Whitbread Plc expects a lower impact from the UK budget than previously feared, as the performance of the UK business shows signs of recovery.】

item.title: 富时100指数料将下跌，英镑保持稳定
摩根士丹利亚洲奖金增长20%，营收逼近100亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，摩根士丹利去年在亚洲地区的营收逼近创纪录的100亿美元，该行随后将亚洲地区银行家的奖金提高了约20%。【原文：Morgan Stanley increased bonuses by about 20% for bankers in Asia after the firm closed in on a record $10 billion in revenue from the region last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 历史迹象表明日本股市将在大选前上涨
item.description: 若高市早苗首相如日本媒体所报道般提前举行大选，历史经验表明股市投资者将从中获益，至少在短期内如此。【原文：If Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi calls a snap election as local media has reported, history says investors in the stock market will benefit, at least in the short term.】

item.title: 马士基再次穿越红海进行安全测试
item.description: A.P.穆勒-马士基公司已安全驾驶另一艘船舶穿越红海南部海域，这是该公司继大多数航运公司两年未涉足该区域后，第二次成功尝试航行。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S has safely sailed another ship through the southern part of the Red Sea, its second successful attempt after most shipping lines have avoided the area for two years.】

item.title: 据称，SBI和ICICI基金在认购超额的Biocon出售中领衔竞标
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度制药商Biocon Ltd.向机构投资者发售的股票认购需求约为发行量的四倍，其中大部分兴趣来自当地共同基金。【原文：Indian drugmaker Biocon Ltd. drew demand for about four times the shares it offered to institutional investors, with interest largely coming from local mutual funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国招聘行业面临严峻一年：就业市场疲软，人工智能构成威胁
item.description: 英国招聘人员面临又一个艰难年景，劳动力市场持续恶化，加之人工智能带来的威胁日益加剧。【原文：UK recruiters face another difficult year as the labor market continues to deteriorate, compounded by growing threats from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 东京考虑采取措施应对中国禁止军民两用商品出口
item.description: 日本防卫大臣小泉进次郎表示，正就中国限制向日本出口军民两用物品的决定所产生的影响进行评估，并补充称东京将采取适当的反制措施予以应对。【原文：Japanese Defense Minister Shinjiro Koizumi said assessments were ongoing into the impact of China’s decision to restrict exports to Japan of dual-use items for military purposes, and he added Tokyo would take appropriate countermeasures in response.】

item.title: 《金融时报》称瑞银首席执行官埃尔莫蒂计划于2027年4月卸任
item.description: 据《金融时报》周二报道，瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥·埃尔莫蒂计划于2027年4月卸任，消息来源为匿名人士。【原文：UBS Group AG’s Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti is planning to step down in April 2027, the Financial Times reports Tuesday, citing unnamed people.】

item.title: 印度债券下跌，因彭博推迟纳入全球指数
item.description: 印度政府债券价格下跌，此前彭博指数服务公司因投资者要求进一步评估而暂缓将该国债务纳入其全球指数。【原文：Indian government bonds declined after Bloomberg Index Services Ltd. held back from adding the nation’s debt to its global index, citing investors’ request for further evaluation.】

item.title: 中国股市2026年涨势渐起，成交量与融资贷款激增
item.description: 今年以来，中国股市持续走强，成交额创下历史新高，融资融券规模激增，市场情绪日益高涨。【原文：Chinese stocks have been gaining momentum this year with burgeoning sentiment seen in record turnover and a surge in the amount of margin loans.】

item.title: 当所有国王的臣民都过于急于讨好
item.description:
在鲍威尔事件中，唐纳德·特朗普的亲信们严重辜负了他。【原文：

In the Powell drama, Donald Trump’s courtiers have let him down badly.

】

item.title: 尼日利亚即将通过全面人工智能法规以规范数字经济
item.description: 尼日利亚即将通过一项法律，使其成为非洲首批对人工智能实施监管的国家之一。在经历了多年全球科技公司基本不受约束的扩张后，该国将加强对非洲增长最快的数字市场之一的监管力度。【原文：Nigeria is set to pass a law that would place it among the first African countries to regulate artificial intelligence, tightening oversight of one of the continent’s fastest-growing digital markets after years of largely unchecked expansion by global technology firms.】

item.title: 日元暴跌，因有报道称日本首相计划提前大选
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率跌至2024年7月以来最低点，因市场猜测首相高市早苗可能即将宣布提前大选，日元跌势加速。【原文：The yen dropped to its weakest level against the dollar since July 2024, as losses accelerated following speculation that Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi may soon call a snap election.】
